segments.text: Hi , my name is Sovia.What ’ s your name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m a podiatrist . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m a nurse.What do you do in your free time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like to play piano , go bowling and chat with my friends.And you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like to hang out with my friends , play games and go swimming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to go out some time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , that ’ d be great.Where would you like to go ?
segments.speaker: S1
